attributes.comment:
USCIS is like a blackhole, no matter how much money you give them, they will
find more creative ways to spend all that money without no improvements to
efficiency.
I support the increases provided USCIS directors provide a detailed plan as to
how that will be spent. I am a victim of DOL and USCIS inefficiencies, they
operate on their own and are not answerable to any government audits.
Instead of increasing the fee drastically, USCIS directors should first improve
the efficiency of the organization, make it more nimble, right now it is nothing
more than just an employment agency. If USCIS were a private company it would
have gone bankrupt already.
Nothing will change, I do not expect USCIS will be more efficient even if you
give them 10 times the money they are proposing at this time, it is bred in the
culture of managers and directors.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
